title: Fan, late 18th century
medium: Medium: gouache on silk with gold and silver embroidery, spangles and gouache on parchment (mount); silver and gilt on ivory (sticks)
description: Mount has a painted background of flowers and displays of musical instruments. Three painted parchment inserts show winter scenes of provincial life. Central one is in full color with the outer ones in blue and white. Carved ivory sticks with silver and gilding.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Medium: gouache on silk with gold and silver embroidery, spangles and gouache on parchment (mount); silver and gilt on ivory (sticks). Bequest of Sarah Cooper Hewitt. 1931-6-118.
